original_title: Bedlam At The Bank: The 2022 Phillies Yearbook
overview: 2022 brought postseason baseball and a National League pennant back to South Philly. Enjoy "Bedlam At The Bank", the 2022 Phillies Video Yearbook, narrated by Phillies outfielder Kyle Schwarber.
title: Bedlam At The Bank: The 2022 Phillies Yearbook
